title: Loading the client after a game is too slow.
body: It takes more than 30 seconds for me to just get to post game screen, and I'm tired of it. I wish I had a better computer, but alas I can't afford one atm. Any way to make it load faster?

replies.body: Hmmmm let's check really quickly that the option called **"close client during game"** isn't turned on in the client options. With that turned on it will take a little bit for post game to load, so try turning it off and let me know if that helps you see post game lobbies quicker!
